title: Hi my name is Ravi m using pixel 2xlIn that there is camera problem so I send it to service Center
content:
I m sending my phone to service Center for camera problem 
Now the system shows that phone is delivered but I m not getting my phone 
So could u plz tell now what can I do for it 
Because there is no service Center contact details with me 
So plz help me to figure out this
